title: Strategies for Improving Workplace Learning Environments Based on Knowledge Management Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational organizational learning theories and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Case analysis and practical application of a knowledge management system centered on the language domain.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for converting tacit knowledge to explicit knowledge within organizations
Learners can design team-based knowledge-sharing processes using knowledge management systems
Learners can develop an evaluation rubric to improve knowledge accessibility in LMS environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
